pkgmetadata.longdescription: Effect Sizes for Meta-Analysis of Interactions from Factorial Experiments // Compute effect sizes and their sampling variances from factorial experimental designs. The package supports calculation of simple effects, overall effects, and interaction effects for use in factorial meta-analyses. See Gurevitch et al. (2000) doi:10.1086/303337, Morris et al. (2007) doi:10.1890/06-0442, Lajeunesse (2011) doi:10.1890/11-0423.1 and Macartney et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/j.neubiorev.2022.104554.
